Translations.Text: Sapatha akasera ebam ratrite agamanakarira.
Apani janena, ye ratrite ase seta ki
seta eka ujjbala naksatra.
Pratyekera upara ekajana tattbabadhayaka rayeche.
Ata'eba, manusera dekha ucita ki bastu theke se srjita hayeche.
Se srjita hayeche sabege skhalita pani theke.
Eta nirgata haya merudanda o baksapajarera madhya theke.
Niscaya tini take phiriye nite saksama.
Yedina gopana bisayadi pariksita habe
Sedina tara kona sakti thakabe na ebam sahayyakari'o thakabe na.
Sapatha cakrasila akasera
ebam bidaranasila prthibira
niscaya kora'ana satya-mithyara phayasala.
Ebam eta upahasa naya.
Tara bhisana cakranta kare
ara ami'o kausala kari.
Ata'eba, kapheraderake abakasa dina, taderake abakasa dina, kichu dinera jan'ye.
Apani apanara mahana palanakartara namera pabitrata barnana karuna
yini srsti karechena o subin'yasta karechena.
Ebam yini suparimita karechena o patha pradarsana karechena
ebam yini trnadi utpanna karechena
atahpara karechena take kala abarjana.
Ami apanake patha karate thakaba, phale apani bismrta habena na
allaha ya iccha karena ta byatita. Niscaya tini janena prakasya o gopana bisaya.
Ami apanara jan'ye sahaja sariyata sahajatara kare debo.
Upadesa phalaprasu hale upadesa dana karuna
ye bhaya kare, se upadesa grahana karabe
ara ye, hatabhaga, se ta upeksa karabe
se maha-agnite prabesa karabe.
Atahpara sekhane se marabe'o na, jibita'o thakabe na.
Niscaya saphalya labha karabe se, ye sud'dha haya
ebam tara palanakartara nama smarana kare, atahpara namaya adaya kare.
